title: Hell-o-Ween (The Adam and Dr. Drew Show Classics)
itunes:title: Hell-o-Ween (The Adam and Dr. Drew Show Classics)
description: Adam and Drew open the show discussing documentaries and how quickly they can become exceptionally expensive for a variety of reasons. They have a discussion about masks and the lack of continuity when it comes to use methods before Adam explains why the founding fathers and how they couldn't have possibly foreseen. They then go to the phones and speak to a caller who is newly on Vivitrol and experimenting with marijuana, another who has thoughts on personal responsibility and much more.
